name: Going Down (Gareth Williams)
description:
The theme was "You Only Get One", and after much scratching of manly beard on Saturday morning, we came up with the idea that you're on a plane that's crashing and there's only one parachute. We're just a bundle of laughs, we are!

Going Down finished 10th place overall in the Jam section of Ludum Dare 28.

This is an updated build using FNA to replace the original Monogame libraries. Have tested on Windows 10 and seems to be working, YMMV!
